home.subText: We are an Islamic Center that is detected to help our Muslim community and provide the necessary resources for them to succeed.

islamic_schooling.title: Islamic Schooling
islamic_schooling.subText: We provide quran schooling for those who need to learn to read Arabic.

prayer.title: Prayer
prayer.subText: Our Prayer time will be posted on the website and updated automatically

resources.title: Resources
resources.subText: In the resources section there are a lot of information if you need to know about the mosque and our East Grand Forks community

events.title: Events
events.subText: Here you will find all the events and calendar
